metadata.description: Service Tier: Free, Standalone, PerNode, or PerGB2018
Number of days of retention. Free plans can only have 7 days, Standalone and OMS plans include 30 days for free

properties.Query: Event | where Source == "ServiceFabricNodeBootstrapAgent" | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by Computer

List.Title: Summary
List.Content: This solution provides pre-built views for Windows and Linux systems covering key performance metrics (Processor, Disk, Memory & Network).

Tile.Query: search Computer !in ("-") | summarize LastData = max(TimeGenerated) by Computer | where LastData > ago(1h)| count

SecondTile.Query: search Computer !in ("-") | summarize LastData = max(TimeGenerated) by Computer | where LastData < ago(1h)| count

List.Query: search Computer !in ("-") | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by Computer | where Computer != ""

LineChart.Query: Perf | where CounterName == "% Processor Time" | summarize AggregatedValue = avg(CounterValue) by Computer

List.Query: Perf | where CounterName == "% Processor Time" | summarize AggregatedValue = percentile(CounterValue, 90) by Computer
List.NavigationQuery: Perf | where (ObjectName == "Processor" or ObjectName == "System") and CounterName == "% Processor Time" | summarize AggregatedValue = percentile(CounterValue, 90) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h), Computer | sort by TimeGenerated desc | render barchart// Oql: Type:Perf (ObjectName:Processor OR ObjectName:System) AND (CounterName="% Processor Time") | measure percentile90(CounterValue) by Computer | Display StackedBarChart

LineChart.Query: Perf | where CounterName == "% Free Space" | summarize AggregatedValue = avg(CounterValue) by Computer

List.Query: Perf | where (CounterName == "% Free Space" and InstanceName != "_Total") | summarize AvgFreeSpace = percentile(CounterValue, 90) by Computer, InstanceName | sort by AvgFreeSpace asc
List.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

NavigationSelect.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

LineChart.Query: Perf | where CounterName == "Free Megabytes" and InstanceName !contains "HardDisk" and InstanceName !contains "Program Files" | summarize AggregatedValue = avg(CounterValue) by Computer

List.Query: Perf | where (CounterName == "Free Megabytes" and InstanceName != "_Total") and InstanceName !contains "HardDisk" and InstanceName !contains "Program Files" | summarize AvgFreeSpace = percentile(CounterValue, 90) by Computer, InstanceName | sort by AvgFreeSpace asc
List.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

NavigationSelect.NavigationQuery: search {selected item} | sort by TimeGenerated desc

Header.Title: % Committed Bytes in Use / % Used Memory

LineChart.Query:
Perf | where (CounterName == "% Committed Bytes In Use" or CounterName == "% Used Memory") | summarize AggregatedValue = percentile(CounterValue, 90) by Computer
// Oql: Type:Perf (CounterName="% Committed Bytes In Use" OR CounterName="% Used Memory") | Measure percentile90(CounterValue) by Computer // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: f8c8e13b-48be-4a91-818e-c6fad2243a4b} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True} // Version: 0.1.129

List.Query:
Perf | where CounterName == "Available MBytes" or CounterName == "Available MBytes Memory" | summarize AvgFreeMemory = percentile(CounterValue, 90) by Computer | sort by AvgFreeMemory asc
// Oql: Type:Perf   CounterName:"Available MBytes" OR CounterName:"Available MBytes Memory"  | measure percentile90(CounterValue) as AvgFreeMemory by Computer | sort AvgFreeMemory // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: f8c8e13b-48be-4a91-818e-c6fad2243a4b} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True} // Version: 0.1.129
List.NavigationQuery:
Perf | where (ObjectName == "Memory" and CounterName == "Available MBytes") | summarize AvgFreeMemory = percentile(CounterValue, 90) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h), Computer | sort by AvgFreeMemory asc | render barchart
// Oql: Type:Perf  ((ObjectName:Memory AND CounterName:"Available MBytes" )) | measure percentile90(CounterValue) as AvgFreeMemory by Computer | sort AvgFreeMemory  | Display StackedBarChart // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: f8c8e13b-48be-4a91-818e-c6fad2243a4b} // Settings: {NVQ: True; PTT: True} // Version: 0.1.129

Donut.Query: Perf | where ObjectName == "Network Interface" and CounterName == "Bytes Total/sec" | summarize BytesTotal = avg(CounterValue) by Computer | sort by BytesTotal desc

List.Query: Perf | where ObjectName == "Network Interface" and CounterName == "Bytes Total/sec" | summarize BytesTotal = avg(CounterValue) by Computer | sort by BytesTotal desc
List.NavigationQuery: Perf | where ObjectName == "Network Interface" and CounterName == "Bytes Total/sec" | summarize BytesTotal = avg(CounterValue) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h), Computer | sort by TimeGenerated desc | render barchart

LineChart.Query: Perf | where ObjectName == "Network Adapter" and CounterName == "Bytes Received/sec" | summarize PacketsReceived = avg(CounterValue) by Computer
Perf | where ObjectName == "Network Adapter" and CounterName == "Bytes Sent/sec" | summarize PacketsSent = avg(CounterValue) by Computer
Perf | where ObjectName == "Network Interface" and CounterName == "Bytes Total/sec" | summarize BytesTotal = avg(CounterValue) by Computer

Donut.Query: Perf | where (CounterName == "Total Bytes Transmitted" or CounterName == "Total Bytes Received") | summarize BytesTotal = avg(CounterValue) by Computer | sort by BytesTotal desc

List.Query: Perf | where (CounterName == "Total Bytes Transmitted" or CounterName == "Total Bytes Received") | summarize BytesTotal = sum(CounterValue) by Computer

TileOne.Query: search Computer !in ("-") | summarize LastData = max(TimeGenerated) by Computer | where LastData > ago(1h)| count

TileTwo.Legend: Servers not currently reporting to OMS
TileTwo.Query: search Computer !in ("-") | summarize LastData = max(TimeGenerated) by Computer | where LastData < ago(1h)| count

DataFlowVerification.Query: search *// Oql: * // Args: {OQ: True; WorkspaceId: f8c8e13b-48be-4a91-818e-c6fad2243a4b} // Settings: {PTT: True; SortI: True} // Version: 0.1.129
